result.html: Abair liom a bhfuil uaitTell me what you want.
result.ponchtml: Abair liom a ḃfuil uaitTell me what you want.

result.eng: Would you do me a favour? - Fine, what do you need?
result.ga: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uait
result.orig: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uait
result.html: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uaitWould you do me a favour? - Fine, what do you need?
result.ponchtml: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uaitWould you do me a favour? - Fine, what do you need?

result.eng: Is that the woman who left you?
result.ga: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uait
result.orig: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uait
result.html: An í sin an bhean a d'imigh uaitIs that the woman who left you?
result.ponchtml: An í sin an ḃean a d'imiġ uaitIs that the woman who left you?

result.eng: What do you need to do the job?
result.ga: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamh
result.html: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamhWhat do you need to do the job?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫeastaíonn uait ċun an jab a ḋéanaṁWhat do you need to do the job?

result.html: Caith uait éThrow it away.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫ uait éThrow it away.

result.eng: How much money do you want?
result.html: Cá mhéad airgid atá uaitHow much money do you want?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad airgid atá uaitHow much money do you want?

result.eng: It is nice to hear from you again.
result.ga: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arís
result.orig: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arís
result.html: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arísIt is nice to hear from you again.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go deas cloisteáil uait arísIt is nice to hear from you again.

result.ga: Dia dhuit Céard atá ag teastáil uait
result.orig: Dia dhuit Céard atá ag teastáil uait
result.html: Dia dhuit Céard atá ag teastáil uaitHello! What do you need?
result.ponchtml: Dia ḋuit Céard atá ag teastáil uaitHello! What do you need?

result.eng: How many bedrooms do you need?
result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait
result.orig: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait
result.html: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?

result.eng: Do you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?
result.ga: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin
result.orig: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin
result.html: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidinDo you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn ḋá uair a' ċloig uait le tú féin a réiteaċ ar maidinDo you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?

result.eng: I can go with you if you need help.
result.ga: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uait
result.orig: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uait
result.html: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uaitI can go with you if you need help.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnaṁ uaitI can go with you if you need help.

result.eng: Come here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ga: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.orig: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.html: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uait Isteaċ an ċisteanaċ leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!

result.eng: What do you want to eat this morning?
result.ga: Céard atá uait le n-ithe ar maidin
result.orig: Céard atá uait le n-ithe ar maidin
result.html: Céard atá uait le n-ithe ar maidinWhat do you want to eat this morning?
result.ponchtml: Céard atá uait le n-iṫe ar maidinWhat do you want to eat this morning?

result.eng: Do you need more milk with that?
result.ga: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sin
result.orig: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sin
result.html: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sinDo you need more milk with that?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tuilleaḋ bainne uait leis sinDo you need more milk with that?

result.html: Gabh i leith uaitCome here.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uaitCome here.

result.eng: Do you want something to drink?
result.ga: An bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ól
result.orig: An bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ól
result.html: An bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ga: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.orig: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.html: Ar do bhás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ponchtml: Ar do ḃás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
